now who also wants to b a legend and upload anutha Rose McGowan Movie called Kiss & Tell?

Resolution is 720x480 so the small black bars top and bottom haven't been cropped. No bid deal but the aspect ratio is wrong. If you change the aspect ratio to 16:9 on playback it'll display correctly.
Aside from the above, the quality is quite good
